item.title: The Lost Flickr of Hope
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: I woke up this Tuesday morning to a shock. OMG this Yahoo! bar on top of @Flickr is fugly. If this bar doesn’t go from Flickr, I will. pic.twitter.com/dolGKR8jJu — Tahir (@codie) July 2, 2013 This bar is wrong in a lot of ways. The way it stands out in all its ugliness from the rest of the Flickr visual design speaks volumes about how it was executed (thoughtlessly, in a draconian way), how little the Flickr development team have a say in how things work (I can’t imagine a product owner who would allow such visual desecration of their product without a protest) and how little Yahoo!
